column1: This station history list is now deprecated.  Please refer to the new
The new list is based on more current information and will be updated
regularly.  If you do not see your station listed by its name
look for it using the USAF Station ID
Latitude and Longitude.  Station names will change from time to time
but these IDs and their corresponding Lat/Lons are more reliable.
